channel.title: Attempting to open any heavy web-page freezes(i cant do anything) the entire workstation until the whole page is fully loaded.
channel.description: Attempting to open any heavy web-page freezes(i cant do anything) the entire workstation until the whole page is fully loaded. (maps.google required 2 min waitnig. attempting to open rambler.ru while 2 tabs of google-maps still opened makes computer shutdown in case of owerheating) 1gb ram for xfce gateway, 4gb ram for xfce workstation Whith similar settings on whonix-13 everything works perfect (more than 15 heavy tabs loading at the same time did not affected on workstation) Already reinstalled station and gateway twice :3 Does anyone had this problem? Is it fixable?

item.title: Attempting to open any heavy web-page freezes(i cant do anything) the entire workstation until the whole page is fully loaded.
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Research: Disabling TBB E10/mutiprocess for Performance Boost Development
The problems many have noticed with TBB performance with current VM configurations are all traceable to Firefox’s transition to a multiprocess model. One solution is to simply push up VM resource allocation. Meanwhile a more pragmatic solution is to change the behavior of the software to become more efficient. We lose out on upstream sandboxing work whenever it materializes, but we have firejail to make up for it. Open questions: Does turning off E10 make TBB fingerprintable? (Tor dev quest…

Read full topic

item.title: Attempting to open any heavy web-page freezes(i cant do anything) the entire workstation until the whole page is fully loaded.
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Patrick:

Try adding additional RAM to Whonix-Workstation with rads.

That one I don’t understand. You mean reduce gateway RAM so safe RAM so more and be added to workstation?

RAM can be increased in VirtualBox settings.

I dropped the ball on that one. What is said doesn’t make any sense any way you look at it.

item.source: Attempting to open any heavy web-page freezes(i cant do anything) the entire workstation until the whole page is fully loaded.

item.title: Attempting to open any heavy web-page freezes(i cant do anything) the entire workstation until the whole page is fully loaded.
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Unknown.

Whonix 13 was based on Debian jessie. Whonix 14 is based on Debian stretch. Components Whonix is based on are updated due to reliance on the components Whonix is based on. It’s impossible to not rely on any third parties (as explained in links below). These components don’t necessarily high performance inside (VirtualBox) virtual machines as their development/testing goal.

The following applies:

  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/FAQ#Linux_Distributions
  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/About#Based_on_Debian
  • https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle

Meaning, analysis / patches welcome.
( https://www.whonix.org/wiki/FAQ#Patches_are_Welcome )

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: huhhah
item.description:
I have redused ram on gateway to 256mb, multiprocess on station’s tor to 1, now with 5700mb ram on workstation its works just a little bit better, but thank you anyway.

Why 14 wersion of whinix uses more ram then 13? On 13 even with 2gb ram workstation works better, than 14 with 5700mb?

item.source: Attempting to open any heavy web-page freezes(i cant do anything) the entire workstation until the whole page is fully loaded.

item.title: Attempting to open any heavy web-page freezes(i cant do anything) the entire workstation until the whole page is fully loaded.
item.dc:creator: 0brand
item.description:
Hi huhhah

This could be a low RAM issue. Large pages using most of the resources. Try adding additional RAM to Whonix-Workstation with rads. You can also terminate any unneeded processes on the host to free up RAM if needed.

https://whonix.org/wiki/RAM_Adjusted_Desktop_Starter

This could also be related to Tor Browser E10/multiprocess which can affect performance.

https://forums.whonix.org/t/research-disabling-tbb-e10-mutiprocess-for-performance-boost/6431

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: huhhah
item.description:
Attempting to open any heavy web-page freezes(i cant do anything) the entire workstation until the whole page is fully loaded. (maps.google required 2 min waitnig. attempting to open rambler.ru while 2 tabs of google-maps still opened makes computer shutdown in case of owerheating)
1gb ram for xfce gateway, 4gb ram for xfce workstation
Whith similar settings on whonix-13 everything works perfect (more than 15 heavy tabs loading at the same time did not affected on workstation)
Already reinstalled station and gateway twice :3
Does anyone had this problem? Is it fixable?
